Adding a main contact:

  1. In the Main Contact field, type the name of the contact to see if they are in the system already
  2. If yes, click on the name and it will be added to the field.
  3. The email will be auto populated if it is on the Contact.
    1. If this is inaccurate, you will need to click on the Contact name to open the record and edit the email address field in the contact and save. It will auto-populate once updated.

New Contact

  1. If when you type the name and no records appear, you will need to create a new contact.
    1. In the field Main Contact select +New Contact & choose General Contact and add in these fields:
      1. Full name
      2. Role
      3. Email
      4. Primary Affiliation- this should be the school/org they work for.
    2. Save & it will add to your booking automatically.
